SEARCH
Package cycling

Class Stage

java.lang.Object
cycling.Stage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Stage extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a stage in a race Contains the results of riders in that stage Uses the Result() class
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

      public Stage()

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Gets the name of theStage - should be unique
      Returns:
      String of the name of the stage

    • setName

      public void setName(String newName)
      Sets the name of the Stage - should be unique, not be null, empty, over 30 chars or contain whitespace
      Parameters:
      newName - String new name that abides by rules of name

    • getID

      public int getID()
      Gets the ID of stage, each stage should have a unique ID
      Returns:
      int unique ID of stage

    • setID

      public void setID(int newId)
      Sets ID of stage, should be unique and only be set at stage creation to avoid issues
      Parameters:
      newId - unique int ID number to identify stage

    • getDesc

      public String getDesc()
      Gets the description of stage
      Returns:
      String, may be much longer than name

    • setDesc

      public void setDesc(String newDesc)
      Sets the description of the stage
      Parameters:
      newDesc - String, not restricted by size or contents

    • getLength

      public double getLength()
      Gets the length of a stage
      Returns:
      double representation of the stage in km

    • setLength

      public void setLength(double newLength)
      Sets the length of a stage in km
      Parameters:
      newLength - double length of stage

    • getRace

      public int getRace()
      Gets the ID value of the race the stage belongs to
      Returns:
      int unique ID of race

    • setRace

      public void setRace(int newRace)
      Sets the ID value of the race the stage belongs to Should typically only be set on stage creation to avoid later issues
      Parameters:
      newRace - int unique ID of race

    • getType

      public StageType getType()
      Gets the type of stage, uses StageType() enum Can be flat, medium mountain, high mountain, or time trial
      Returns:
      StageType

    • setType

      public void setType(StageType newType)
      Sets the type of stage, uses StageType() enum Can be flat, medium mountain, high mountain, or time trial
      Parameters:
      newType - StageType

    • getState

      public boolean getState()
      Gets the state of Stage - whether setup has been concluded and it is waiting for results or not Default false
      Returns:
      boolean true if waiting for results, false if not

    • setState

      public void setState(boolean newState)
      Gets the state of Stage. Should not be changed from true back to false Default false
      Parameters:
      newState - boolean true if waiting for results, false if not

    • getCheckpoints

      public ArrayList<Integer> getCheckpoints()
      Gets a list of all the IDs of the checkpoints within a stage
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Integers, each are the unique ID of a checkpoint

    • addCheckpoint

      public void addCheckpoint(Integer checkpointId)
      Adds a checkpoint to the stage Checkpoints are not sorted initially
      Parameters:
      checkpointId - Integer ID value of checkpoint to add to stage

    • removeCheckpoint

      public void removeCheckpoint(int checkpointId)
      Removes a checkpoint from the stage ID of checkpoint not in stage should not be given Checkpoint should also be removed from system after removal from stage
      Parameters:
      checkpointId - int ID of checkpoint to be removed

    • getAllRiderResults

      public ArrayList<Result> getAllRiderResults()
      Gets a list of the results of all riders entered in this stage For adjusted results, getAdjustedRiderResults()
      Returns:
      ArrayList of type Result()

    • setAllRiderResults

      public void setAllRiderResults(ArrayList<Result> newResults)
      Overwrites all results of this stage To add a single rider's results or remove a rider from a stage, use addRiderResults(cycling.Result) and removeRider(int) respectively
      Parameters:
      newResults - ArrayList of type Result()

    • getRiderResults

      public LocalTime[] getRiderResults(int riderId) throws IDNotRecognisedException
      Gets the Result of a specified rider in the stage
      Parameters:
      riderId - ID value of rider to get results for
      Returns:
      Result() of specified rider
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException - when rider is not found in the stage

    • addRiderResults

      public void addRiderResults(Result newResult) throws DuplicatedResultException
      Adds a single rider's results to the stage. Needs to be put into a Result
      Parameters:
      newResult - Results of rider in Result()
      Throws:
      DuplicatedResultException - when rider's results already exist in stage

    • removeRider

      public void removeRider(int riderId) throws IDNotRecognisedException
      Removes a specified rider and their results from the stage
      Parameters:
      riderId - ID value of rider to remove
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException - when rider does not exist in stage

    • getAdjustedRiderResults

      public ArrayList<Result> getAdjustedRiderResults()
      Gets results of all riders with times adjusted for General Classification For unadjusted times, see getAllRiderResults()
      Returns:
      ArrayList of type Result()

    • getSortedElapsedResults

      public ArrayList<Result> getSortedElapsedResults()
      Gets all results in stage like getAllRiderResults(), except sorted by total elapsed time
      Returns:
      ArrayList of type Result(), sorted by Result.getTotalTime

    • getSortedCheckpointResults

      public ArrayList<Result> getSortedCheckpointResults(int sortCheckpoint)
      Gets results sorted by specified checkpoint time, in order of checkpoints
      Parameters:
      sortCheckpoint - int of which checkpoint to sort by (0 is start time, last value is finish time)
      Returns:
      ArrayList of type Result()

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
